name: My Hypnotized Family
description:
“My Hypnotized Family”


“My Hypnotized Family” is an adult choose-your-own-adventure hand-drawn visual novel, where nothing is off limits.

The more you see her do it, the more tempting it becomes to hypnotize the women in your family to become yours and yours only...

Will you use the power of hypnosis to turn family love into sexual passion?
